annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m taking a look at a summer cocktail that will cool off the summer heat called the Jack Rose. It’s a delightfully crisp co...
annotations.title: Jack Rose | How to Drink

textContent:
.5oz Grenadine
1oz Lime juice
2oz Applejack

Shake and pour
Garnish with cherry or lime wheel

title: Jack Rose
